channel.title: Certain Special attack help/Handcannon
channel.description: Hi for all special attacks such as ddp or even d long spec weps that need the same special energy dont work. When i try to use the special it says not enough special energy . Even when i use infspec it still says not enough. Also how do i add a working hand cannon. Help anyone??
